subject: Relationships
title: The Narcissistic Partner Playbook
description: One-minute skill: The Narcissistic Partner Playbook.

hook.text: Phase one: you're perfect. Phase two: you're flawed. Phase three: you're discarded. The pattern never varies.

buildup.text: Narcissistic relationships follow a predictable sequence: idealize, devalue, and discard â€” then often hoover back.

discovery.text: During idealization, you feel like the most special person alive. During devaluation, you feel worthless.

twist.text: The idealization wasn't real admiration. It was a projection. The narcissist loved what you reflected, not who you are.

climax.text: Understanding the playbook is liberating. When you see the pattern, you stop blaming yourself for the devaluation.

punchline.text: Idealize, devalue, discard. The narcissist's playbook never changes.

quiz.question: What are the three phases of narcissistic relationships?
